CustomField.formula:
If (max( Total_Combined_Credit_Current_FY__c , Total_Combined_Credit_Last_Year__c, Total_Combined_Credit_Two_Years_Ago__c) = Total_Combined_Credit_Current_FY__c, Total_Combined_Credit_Current_FY__c,
If (max( Total_Combined_Credit_Current_FY__c , Total_Combined_Credit_Last_Year__c, Total_Combined_Credit_Two_Years_Ago__c) = Total_Combined_Credit_Last_Year__c, Total_Combined_Credit_Last_Year__c, Total_Combined_Credit_Two_Years_Ago__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The sum of all (hard/soft/partial-soft credit) gifts made by this Account in its "best giving year" out of the last 3 FYs (i.e. this year, last year and two years ago). Used in the automation that sets Donor Level and Current Ladder (See mass-actions scheduler app)
CustomField.label: High Current + Last 2 FY
